alert.note: Alert for Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 21 at 3:37PM PST until February 23 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 21 to 27 feet. * WHERE...All beaches and shorelines of Douglas, Coos, and Curry Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Large breaking waves will create hazardous conditions along and within the surf zone, and could inundate beaches and low lying shorelines. Beach erosion is possible, and exposed infrastructure may be damaged. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Stay away from the surf zone and off of jetties. Area beaches may become hazardous due to dangerous surf conditions.

area.areaDesc: Curry County Coast; South Central Oregon Coast
